com.google.gxp.compiler.java
Class JavaUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gxp.compiler.java.JavaUtil

public class JavaUtil
extends Object

Contains static functions for validating java expressions and types, and a couple additional java utility functions.

Validate the given NativeType and adds alerts to the sink if necessary.

Returns:
a String representing the validated type

validateConjunctiveType

public static String validateConjunctiveType(AlertSink alertSink,
                                             NativeType type)
Validate the given NativeType and adds alerts to the sink if necessary. Allows for conjunctive types (ex: Foo & Bar). This is taking a bit of a shortcut, as if java ever allowed something like "extends List & Baz" an alert would be incorrectly be generated. Java doesn't currently allow this though so we're fine.

Returns:
a String representing the validated type

validateName

public static String validateName(AlertSink alertSink,
                                  Node node,
                                  String name)
Validate that the given name is a valid java variable name. Add an Alert to the AlertSink if it isn't.

Returns:
the name

validateAnnotation

public static String validateAnnotation(AlertSink alertSink,
                                        JavaAnnotation annotation)
Validate that the given JavaAnnotation contains a well formed Java annotation.

Returns:
the well formed annotation.

toReferenceType

public static String toReferenceType(String type)
Returns:
the most general reference type that corresponds to the specified a Java type, or the specified Java type if it is already a reference type (ie: a class/interface).

                           String type)

isValidPrimitive

public static final boolean isValidPrimitive(String primitive,
                                             String type)
Returns:
true if the primitive is a valid literal of the specified type, false otherwise.
